segments.text: I'm afraid it's bad news for you . You haven't got the position .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no ! I can't have failed . Are you sure ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid so . I'm terribly sorry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sucks . But Arden told me he's satisfied with my qualifications and experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He's the only one of the several to decide this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How am I going to face the fellows in our office ? They thought I would be promoted . They must be waiting for my good news .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think the thing can be that serious . You should face the result . Besides , I don't think the position is the best for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Keep working hard , and then you will get another chance of promotion someday .
segments.speaker: S1
